mapper.sql: date_Forecast, town_code, Pr03, Pr06, Pr12, pr24, Rh, T, Tmax, Tmin, Cloud, Wind_D, Wind_S, SnowF03, SnowF06, SnowF12, SnowF24, SnowD, ww3, ww6, ww12, AQI, PM25
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from townjxh
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into townjxh (date_Forecast, town_code, Pr03, Pr06, Pr12, pr24, Rh, T, Tmax, Tmin, Cloud, Wind_D, Wind_S, SnowF03, SnowF06, SnowF12, SnowF24, SnowD, ww3, ww6, ww12, AQI, PM25) values (#{dateForecast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{townCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pr03,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pr06,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pr12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pr24,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{t,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tmax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cloud,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{windD,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{windS,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snowf03,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snowf06,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snowf12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snowf24,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snowd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ww3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ww6,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ww12,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{aqi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pm25,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
